resources.string:
Ok, this a simple text, to test the app 
 is working 'fine'... 
 looks very great yet, 
 it's take so long to the end. 
 But, is really necessary. 
 If not, maybe never can see 
 the scroll down working... 
 So, let's take a rare words... 
 XD or :D ? Which of these 
 you use with frequency ? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Take this message outside of the box 
 What's you talking about? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 is the scroll down out there? 
 or what's it ? 
 Okay, Okay... You got skills 
 Brock, from Brawl Stars 
 End line...
